survey_name: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction and user experience with AI-powered customer service chatbots across various industries.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer service chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single selection. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges for accurate data.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer service chatbots?

questions.question_text: Which industries have you used AI chatbots for customer service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input for uncovered industries.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which industries have you used AI chatbots for customer service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the overall performance of AI chatbots in resolving your queries? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with clear anchors. Display as radio buttons or a visual scale for better UX.

questions.question_text: What do you consider the biggest advantage of using AI chatbots over human customer service?
